# Examples

## Logistic 
 
```{r}

data(Titanic)
Titanic=dplyr::as_tibble(Titanic)

# Get the row indices to replicate
idx <- rep(1:nrow(Titanic),Titanic$n)
# Drop count column n
Titanic$n <- NULL
# replicate each row n-times
Titanic=Titanic[idx, ]
Titanic$Survived=as.factor(Titanic$Survived)
  
mod=flipscores::glm_flipscores(Survived~.+Class*Sex,data=Titanic,family = binomial,score_type = "basic")
summary(mod)
```
